meanings.definition: Produced or originating within the organism or cells.
meanings.sent1: The autogenic process of cell division is essential for growth.
meanings.sent2: Her autogenic healing abilities amazed the doctors.
meanings.sent3: The autogenic plants seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: His autogenic creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The autogenic nature of the immune system is truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The autogenic power of positive thinking can be life-changing.
meanings.sent2: She had an autogenic talent for problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: His autogenic laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The autogenic motivation within her drove her to success.
meanings.sent5: The autogenic inspiration from nature sparked his creativity.
